title: Client closes after game
body:
So for some reason after the 5.13 patch the client closes after a game is finished, it recently had a corrupt file or something and i repaired it via the launcher, but this issue still seems to plague me.. to continue playing i have to re-open (a number of times to get it to actually open) the game and re-login, this ONLY seems to happen after a game is finished and i click the continue button. (Using Windows 8.1 if it helps with troubleshooting this specific error)

Anyone else had this issue? is it a known issue? are there any solutions currently?

replies.body:
When you get into game, Alt-Tab and click the little Riot logo on your taskbar. This will open another window with chat and everything. You should be able to access the end game details when the game finishes.

-Denki
